        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Creates a clone of this Notifier.

        The clone will contain a new empty listeners list and is independent from this object.

      • cleanupListeners

        public void cleanupListeners()
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        This method iterates through all listeners (including global listeners), and checks for discarded listeners and removes them.

        You are not required to call this method after discarding a NotificationListener, because, anyhow, this entity will not use them in the future.
        Call this method only if you need this entity to immediately remove discarded listeners.

        After calling this method, this entity is guaranteed to not reference any discarded listener.

        Specified by:
        cleanupListeners in interface Notifier

      • isNotificationsDisabled

        public boolean isNotificationsDisabled()
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Returns true if notifications are disabled.
        Specified by:
        isNotificationsDisabled in interface Notifier
        Returns:
        true if notifications are disabled

      • disableNotifications

        public void disableNotifications()
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Further notifications are disabled. Which means that all further calls to Notifier.notifyNow(int, Object) or Notifier.notify(int, Object) are ignored.

        Note: If there were scheduled notifications using Notifier.notify(int, Object), then those are not canceled after calling this method. If you want to cancel them use Notifier.cancelNotifications().

        Specified by:
        disableNotifications in interface Notifier

      • enableNotifications

        public void enableNotifications()
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Further notifications are enabled. Which means that all further calls to notifyNow or notify are not ignored.
        Specified by:
        enableNotifications in interface Notifier

      • notifyNow

        public final void notifyNow(int notification_code,
             Object data)
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Executes the code of all listeners that were added for the given notification_code. The data parameter is supplied for the listener.

        The calling order of the listeners is undetermined. Thus a new listener may be called before an older listener and vice versa.

        Listeners of which NotificationListener.canBeNotified() method returns false are ignored and removed from the list of listeners.

        Specified by:
        notifyNow in interface Notifier
        data - extra data supplied for the listener when its code is executed

      • notify

        public void notify(int notification_code,
          Object data)
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        For each listener that was added using the given notification_code, this method does one of the following actions.

        If calling NotificationListener.isInstantNotification() returns true then the listener's code is executed immediately.

        If calling NotificationListener.isInstantNotification() returns false then this method schedules an event in order to execute the listener's code.

        Regarding the last case, there should be an individual event for each listener, and each of them is scheduled at the current simulator's time.
        Also, this method will not schedule another event for a listener if it already has another scheduled and not yet processed event with the same notification_code and data.

        The calling order of the listeners is undetermined. Thus a new listener may be called before an older listener and vice versa.

        Use Notifier.notifyNow(int, Object) to notify listeners immediately.

        Specified by:
        notify in interface Notifier
        data - extra data supplied for the listener when its code is executed

      • cancelNotifications

        public void cancelNotifications()
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Cancels all previously scheduled events using Notifier.notify(int, Object).
        Specified by:
        cancelNotifications in interface Notifier
